General.Name: Lechwerke AG
General.Description: Lechwerke AG, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an energy supplier in Germany. It supplies electricity and gas to homes, companies, and municipalities; and offers a range of energy solutions. The company operates 36 hydroelectric power plants. It provides various range of charging infrastructure solutions; and provision of technical services related to planning, construction and operation of high, medium, and low voltage systems, as well as digital solutions. In addition, the company offers telecommunications services. It serves network and plant construction, power generation, electromobility, and telecommunication sectors. The company is headquartered in Augsburg, Germany. Lechwerke AG operates as a subsidiary of innogy SE.
